Package index

Project for region

proj_region()
Projection for the area of interest with specified way of projection
proj_equal_area()
Projection for the area of interest with equal area projection
proj_conformal()
Projection for the area of interest with conformal projection
proj_equidistant()
Projection for the area of interest with equidistant projection
proj_specify()
Generating projection by the geo-boundary and the shorthand name

Project for larger extent

proj_hemisphere()
Projection for hemishpere
proj_world()
Specify a world map projection
world_proj_list
World Map projection list

Other functions

check_utm_zone()
Calculate the UTM zone number and the proj4 string
check_gauss_kruger_3_deg()
Calculate the 3-degree Gauss Kruger zone number and the central longitude of the input longitude range
check_gauss_kruger_6_deg()
Calculate the 6-degree Gauss Kruger zone number and the central longitude of the input longitude range
